tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InvestmentResearchReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publish_date DATE,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investment_research_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_title VARCHAR(255),
  analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
  report_date DATE,
  report_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE analyst_recommendations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
  recommendation VARCHAR(50),
  recommendation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE investment_research_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_title VARCHAR(255),
  analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
  publish_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE analyst_recommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recommendation_text TEXT,
  analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
  ticker_symbol VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE market_commentary (
  commentary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  commentary_text TEXT,
  market_date DATE,
  analyst_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE investment_research_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_title VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE analyst_recommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
    recommendation_type VARCHAR(20),
    recommendation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE market_commentary (
    commentary_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    commentary_date DATE,
    commentary_text TEXT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Investment_Research_Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_title VARCHAR(255),
    report_content TEXT,
    published_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Analyst_Recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    recommendation TEXT,
    recommendation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Market_Commentary (
    commentary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    commentator_name VARCHAR(100),
    market_trend VARCHAR(50),
    commentary_text TEXT,
    commentary_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE User_Accounts (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    password VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Subscription_Plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    plan_description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
